description: This React component Named 'Preview' renders sanitized HTML inside an iframe for safe preview purposes, stripping scripts, iframes, inline handlers, and external UI injections to ensure security. It also handles environment-specific rendering and empty states.

methods.name: Preview({ html, height = 'calc(100vh - 64px - 32px)' })
methods.description: React functional component that sanitizes provided HTML and renders it inside an iframe, with safeguards for security and environment considerations.
